column4: I viewed in LibreOffice and wvText and got jibberish and "lwpuk" which when Googling shows same kind of gibberish.  So, yes likely need some speecial font or character set.
got me ... maybe ask the person who wrote the doc?
if you google "lwpuk" you will see many documents as funky as yours, all from India.  So perhaps some hindi or tamil character set or font?
